title: OT11: Openezer Scrooge
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author is attending the Winter Solstice celebration and surrounding rationalist community megameetup in New York.
- The author mentions GiveWell's list of most effective charities and promotes effective altruism.
- The author shares an article written about someone in the comments section.
- The author makes a blatant plug for their Amazon affiliate link to support their blog.
- The author highlights some notable comments from readers on their recent posts.

Key learnings:
- It's important to actively promote effective altruism and consider the most effective charities when donating.
- Building a community and supporting the work of others can be beneficial for personal and professional growth.

Key questions:
- None explicitly mentioned in this post.
